title: Rito I need some RP for my chroma
body: Hey rito I am so close to getting chroma pack for my rocket Trist skin, I'm on 469 Rp (TEHE 69) And I need 121 Rp extra. I would buy another RP but thats a lot of RP I won't be using. Cmon rito do a man - who just purchased final boss Veigar - a favor.

replies.body: send 20 fan art pictures in with a ticket

Send a ticket, probs won't happen anyway, also they don't care what you spend your RP on, they care that they billed you 20 bucks, and they will probably still want fan art drawn to even give you 20 RP.
